This is a research project I completed which aimed to quantify the confidence we should have in a trained model applied ot our data set.

The full paper is available [here](Research_Task_Gurpreet_Johl.pdf).

Slides from a presentation I gave at the Nuffield Department of Orthopaedics, Rheumatology and Musculoskeletal Sciences (NDORMS) at the University of Oxford are available [here](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1-ArIC5GdrNPtVm8Wbwe7qTjOkUNGnzd2I_SAYQBNLnE/edit?usp=sharing).
